product_name: Core Concepts Hot Dome Hoodie Top - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Looking for a midweight top with a hood to add warmth underneath a helmet? Check. Looking for a next-to-skin baselayer to tackle chilly days? Check. The Core Concepts Hot Dome Hoodie Top has it all. Polartec(R) Power Dry baselayer fabric has a lofted grid pattern inside that provides insulation and breathability. Top is moisture wicking, breathable and quick drying so you stay dry as you sweat; offers 4-way stretch. Snug-fitting hood fits under a climbing helmet. Thumbholes at cuffs extend coverage over the hands. Core Concepts Hot Dome Hoodie Top for men is designed in Idaho and made in Washington state. Overstock.
short_description: Looking for a midweight top with a hood to add warmth underneath a helmet? Check. Looking for a next-to-skin baselayer to tackle chilly days? Check. The Core Concepts Hot Dome Hoodie Top has it all.
